Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that connects two students, showing how it can be used to communicate over a distance.
The student can show in their drawing that the device uses sound to send and receive messages.
The student can illustrate in their drawing that the string telephone uses basic materials provided (like cups and string).
The student can depict that the device allows communication from one student to another over a distance.
The student can represent how this simple device helps solve the problem of communicating over long distances without modern technology.
